widget.name: IFrame
widget.description: The IFrame allows to embed another website in the client. The URL is based on the attribute of the context object.

property.caption: Height
property.description: Height of the viewer in pixels. Use '0' to set it to 'auto''. Note: setting the height to auto usually does not properly work.

property.caption: Width
property.description: Width of the viewer in pixels. Use 0 to set it to 100% of the width of the container

property.caption: Scroll
property.description: Defines whether to scroll when the contents exceed the IFrame size. Always will show scrollbars even if not strictly needed. Setting this property does not guarantee the expected behavior, the styling of the website displayed has much influence on the scrolling behavior of the iframe.

property.caption: URL Attribute
property.description: The attribute that returns the URL of the IFrame.

property.caption: URL prefix
property.description: Optional URL prefix. The attribute value is prefixed with this value.
